info.name: Twitter - Call of Duty: WWII 1.1.68
info.description:
WWII theme with transparency and camo elements while easy on the eyes.

IMPORTANT - set the theme color to #999966 to get the exact look. 
If you want to use the header picture you can!
Link: https://twitter.com/TurdtheT/status/865222939070910464/photo/1

Check out https://www.reddit.com/r/CallOfDutyWorldWarTwo/
info.additionalInfo:
11.05.2018 - Version 1.0.156 - Updated a minor element. Everything is up to date. 

Version 1.0 133 - Its coming together but its alot still to come to match everything and give it the right balance of greens and browns plus the transparency.  More to come! 

Change log:

23.01.2019-18:03GMT+1 - Updated backgrounds to the theme so it is working properly again.
19.05.2017-18:50GMT+2 - Minor edits
19.05.2017-21:13GMT+2 - Fixed "Moments", Alot of corrections. more to come
19.05.2017-21:55GMT+2 - Fixed color over multiple classes wich ruined the suddelty of the theme
20.05.2017-13:50GMT+2 - Fixed polls, icons for dropdown, trends, button links, changed background
                     on several items and tuned them to a more fitting setting.
20.05.2017-15:15GMT+2 - Adjusted profile header card and photo container to fit theme. 
                     Customized moments cards
20.05.2017-16:25GMT+2 - Fixed mouse over effects in Notifications and Moments
20.05.2017-18:30GMT+2 - New look for messages and direct message window plus font fixes
21.05.2017-00:05GMT+2 - Changed follow buttons and dropdown menu
21.05.2017-15:00GMT+2 - Fix GUI error viewing picture galleries, bunch of tweeks to 
                     get the theme more uniform
21.05.2017-16:30GMT+2 - Changed Adaptive Related Searches - background. 
                     Set Message-text pop up color. Changed Gallery tweets backgrounds and fields. 
                     Adjusted stream containers
22.05.2017-01:12GMT+2 - Changed the whole look of the Edit Profile page - Icons, Transparency, 
                     Border colors.
22.05.2017-01:30GMT+2 - Customized the livestream page!
24.05.2017-12:50GMT+2 - Tweeked Input fields, searchbar, no result searches, empty timeline.
25.05.2017-00:30GMT+2 - New button class tweaked. Many minor adjustments. Profile Header Card Editing
25.05.2017-15:19GMT+2 - Tweaked birthday promt.
27.05.2017-14:35GMT+2 - Minor adjustments. Tweaked the moments page.
28.05.2017-23:35GMT+2 - H1 tweek, borders on hovering, found new classes - all fixed.
31.05.2017-15:11GMT+2 - Customized scrollbars, Direct messages have been tuned.
14.06.2017-15:11GMT+2 - Changes to: profileheadercard-joindate, profileheadercard-joindate
profilecardbiogallerytweet, meditaggingblock, gallerytweet, stream-item-header, time, tweet-timestamp.
15.06.2017-21:40GMT+2 - New stuff on twitter - fixed all i could find.
16.06.2017-01:05GMT+2 - New gif container + other fixes
16.06.2017-16:50GMT+2 - Changed direct messages text preview, Custmized Polls, New tweet box +
22.06.2017-23:20GMT+2 - Customized Polls, flex module header, metadata.
25.06.2017-12:30GMT+2 - Customized menu elements again after a change on twitter
28.06.2017-19:45GMT+2 - Spinner/loader tweaked to fit the theme
02.07.2017-23:30GMT+2 - Threaded conversations and stat counter customized
08.12.2017-19:20GMT+1 - Fixed letter counter, several tweaks regarding the pages to retrieve passwords.
23.12.2017-12:40GMT+1 - Fixed tweet window color after changes from twitter.
11.05.2018-04:30GMT+1 - Adapted activity item click action to match the theme.
14.05.2018-23:10GMT+1 - New formatting for answering posts. Adapted.
26.05.2018-07:56GMT+1 - Bunch of fields tweaked. Should be good until they decide to change more stuff.
